summary: This API support to get information of shop
description: This API support to get information of shop.

query.name: shop_logo
query.description: The new shop logo url. Recommend to use images

query.name: description
query.sample: Welcome to our shop. All checp prices while good quality

schema.name: message
schema.sample: Failed to change Shop Description for characters exceeds 500 characters. Please correct and try it again.
schema.description: Messages about the error and it's cause if there're errors. It will be just return the updated information if there's no error.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: response
schema.description: If update successfully, the information is about shop logo, shop name, shop description.

schema.name: shop_logo
schema.description: The Image URL of the shop logo after updated.

schema.name: description
schema.description: The content of the shop description after updated.

schema.name: shop_name
schema.description: The content of the shop name after updated.

schema.name: error
schema.description: The error key if there's error.

error_codes.message: There is no access_token in query.

No permission to current api.
There is no sign in query.
Wrong sign.
no timestamp

Failed to change Shop Name for shop name have been changed in recent 30 days. Please change the shop name at least 30 days later than your last modify.
Failed to change shop name for shop name should be between {min} and {max} characters. Please correct and try it again.
This name is not applicable. Please choose another name.
Failed to change shop logo for the image url is not Shopee image url. Please use Shopee image url.
Failed to change shop logo for something wrong happened with the image url. Please try it again later.
